mapper.sql: id, device_no, gun_mac, out_warehouse_time, in_warehouse_time, state, create_time, update_time, temperance_time, version
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from device_gun
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into device_gun (id, device_no, gun_mac, out_warehouse_time, in_warehouse_time, state, create_time, update_time, temperance_time, version) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deviceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gunMac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outWarehouseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{inWarehouseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{temperanceTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into device_gun
id,
device_no,
gun_mac,
out_warehouse_time,
in_warehouse_time,
state,
create_time,
update_time,
temperance_time,
version,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{deviceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{gunMac,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{outWarehouseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

mapper.update:
update device_gun
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
device_no = #{record.deviceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gun_mac = #{record.gunMac,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
out_warehouse_time = #{record.outWarehouseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
in_warehouse_time = #{record.inWarehouseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
state = #{record.state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
temperance_time = #{record.temperanceTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
version = #{record.version,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update device_gun set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, device_no = #{record.deviceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gun_mac = #{record.gunMac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, out_warehouse_time = #{record.outWarehouseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, in_warehouse_time = #{record.inWarehouseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, state = #{record.state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, temperance_time = #{record.temperanceTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, version = #{record.version,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update device_gun
device_no = #{deviceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gun_mac = #{gunMac,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
out_warehouse_time = #{outWarehouseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
in_warehouse_time = #{inWarehouseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
temperance_time = #{temperanceTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update device_gun set device_no = #{deviceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gun_mac = #{gunMac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, out_warehouse_time = #{outWarehouseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, in_warehouse_time = #{inWarehouseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, temperance_time = #{temperanceTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from device_gun where device_no = #{deviceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and gun_mac=#{gunMac,jdbcType=INTEGER} and state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT a.device_no, a.gun_mac, b.warehouse_name AS gunWarehouseName, b.real_time_state AS gunState, b.gun_model AS gunModel b.gun_tag AS gunTag, d.longitude AS deviceLocationLongitude, d.latitude AS deviceLocationLatirude, d.create_time AS locationEndTime, c.state AS deviceState, c.phone AS mobile ,
FROM (SELECT id, device_no,latitude,longitude,create_time FROM device_location WHERE id IN (SELECT MAX(id) AS ids FROM device_location GROUP BY device_no)) AS d,device_gun a,gun b,device c WHERE a.device_no=c.device_no AND a.gun_mac=b.bluetooth_mac AND d.device_no=c.device_no AND a.state=0 /*(SELECT state FROM device_gun WHERE device_no IN (SELECT device_no FROM device WHERE state=0) AND state=0)*/ AND c.state=0 AND a.device_no = #{deviceNo} GROUP BY a.device_no
UNION ALL
SELECT dls.device_no, dls.longitude AS deviceLocationLongitude, dls.latitude AS deviceLocationLatirude, NULL AS locationEndTime, NULL AS gunWarehouseName, NULL AS gunState, (SELECT ts.state FROM device AS ts WHERE ts.device_no=dls.device_no) AS deviceState, NULL AS gunTag, (SELECT tt.phone FROM device AS tt WHERE tt.device_no=dls.device_no) AS mobile , NULL , NULL AS gunModel FROM device_location AS dls WHERE dls.id IN (SELECT MAX(dl.id) FROM device_location AS dl WHERE dl.device_no IN (SELECT d.device_no FROM device d WHERE NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM device_gun dg WHERE dg.device_no = d.device_no AND dg.state=0 ) AND d.state=0 GROUP BY d.device_no)AND dls.device_no = #{deviceNo} GROUP BY dl.device_no)

SELECT d.id AS deviceLocationId,a.device_no, d.longitude AS deviceLocationLongitude,d.latitude AS deviceLocationLatirude, d.create_time AS locationEndTime, b.warehouse_name AS gunWarehouseName, b.real_time_state AS gunState,c.state AS deviceState,b.gun_tag as gunTag ,c.phone AS mobile ,a.gun_mac,b.gun_model AS gunModel FROM (SELECT id, device_no,latitude,longitude,create_time FROM device_location WHERE id IN (SELECT MAX(id) AS ids FROM device_location GROUP BY device_no)) AS d,device_gun a,gun b,device c WHERE a.device_no=c.device_no AND a.gun_mac=b.bluetooth_mac AND d.device_no=c.device_no AND a.state=0 AND a.device_no = #{deviceNo} GROUP BY a.device_no

SELECT d.id AS deviceLocationId,a.device_no, d.longitude AS deviceLocationLongitude,d.latitude AS deviceLocationLatirude, d.create_time AS locationEndTime, b.warehouse_name AS gunWarehouseName,b.gun_tag as gunTag, b.real_time_state AS gunState,c.state AS deviceState FROM (SELECT id, device_no,latitude,longitude,create_time FROM device_location WHERE id IN (SELECT MAX(id) AS ids FROM device_location GROUP BY device_no)) AS d,device_gun a,gun b,device c WHERE a.device_no=c.device_no AND a.gun_mac=b.bluetooth_mac AND d.device_no=c.device_no AND a.state=0 GROUP BY a.device_no /* SELECT DISTINCT MAX(d.id) as deviceLocationId, b.gun_tag as gunTag ,a.device_no ,d.latitude as deviceLocationLatirude,b.warehouse_name as gunWarehouseName ,d.longitude as deviceLocationLongitude,b.real_time_state as gunState,c.state as deviceState FROM device_gun a,gun b,device c,device_location d WHERE a.device_no=c.device_no AND a.gun_mac=b.bluetooth_mac AND d.device_no=c.device_no AND a.state=0 GROUP BY gunTag,a.device_no*/

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.gun_tag) & COUNT(DISTINCT a.device_no) AS deviceState FROM device_gun a,gun b,device c,device_location d WHERE a.device_no=c.device_no AND a.gun_mac=b.bluetooth_mac AND d.device_no=c.device_no AND a.state=0 AND c.state=2

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.gun_tag) & COUNT(DISTINCT a.device_no) AS deviceState FROM device_gun a,gun b,device c,device_location d WHERE a.device_no=c.device_no AND a.gun_mac=b.bluetooth_mac AND d.device_no=c.device_no AND a.state=0 AND b.real_time_state=2 AND (b.real_time_state=2) OR (b.real_time_state IS NULL)
select device_no from device_gun where gun_mac= #{bluetoothMac,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and state= #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT d.id AS deviceLocationId,a.device_no, d.longitude AS deviceLocationLongitude,d.latitude AS deviceLocationLatirude, d.create_time AS locationEndTime, b.warehouse_name AS gunWarehouseName, b.real_time_state AS gunState,c.state AS deviceState,b.gun_tag as gunTag ,c.phone AS mobile ,a.gun_mac,b.gun_model AS gunModel FROM (SELECT id, device_no,latitude,longitude,create_time FROM device_location WHERE id IN (SELECT MAX(id) AS ids FROM device_location GROUP BY device_no)) AS d,device_gun a,gun b,device c WHERE a.device_no=c.device_no AND a.gun_mac=b.bluetooth_mac AND d.device_no=c.device_no AND a.state=0 AND b.real_time_state=0 AND c.state=0 AND a.device_no like '%' #{deviceNo} '%' GROUP BY gunTag,a.device_no
select DISTINCT device_no from device_gun where gun_mac= #{gunMac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
